original_text: Zimri was one of Elah's officers. He had authority over half of Elah's chariots. Zimri decided to kill King Elah. One day, Elah was in the home of a man called Arza, an officer who had authority over the king's palace in Tirzah. Elah was drinking too much wine and he became drunk.
korean_text: 엘라가 디르사에 있어 왕궁 맡은 자 아르사의 집에서 마시고 취할 때에 그 신하 곧 병거 절반을 통솔한 지휘관 시므리가 왕을 모반하여

sentences.original_text: Zimri was one of Elah's officers
sentences.korean_translation: 심리는 엘라의 장관 중 한 사람이었다

sentences.original_text: He had authority over half of Elah's chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 엘라의 전차 중 반을 관장했다

sentences.original_text: Zimri decided to kill King Elah
One day, Elah was in the home of a man called Arza
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 엘라는 아르사라 불리는 사람의 집에 있었다

sentences.original_text: Arza was an officer who had authority over the king's palace in Tirzah
sentences.korean_translation: 아르사는 디르사에 있는 왕궁을 관장하는 장관이었다

sentences.original_text: Elah was drinking too much wine
sentences.korean_translation: 엘라는 너무 많은 포도주를 마시고 있었다
